short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds campus locations to courses in Schedule Builder and identifies cross campus time conflicts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MScheduler is a simple extension to improve the experience of using Schedule Builder at the University of Michigan. 

It adds several key features: 

- Identifies "Cross Campus Time Conflicts." These are conflicts that occur when a course on North Campus ends at the same time a course on Central Campus begins and vice versa.

- Adds convenient campus location labels to all courses to identify if a course is on North or Central.

- Minor adjustments were made to each course "card" such that important information such as professor names are more visible.

We hope this extension serves you well, and want to hear from you! Send your feedback to mschedulerteam@gmail.com

NOTE 1: Schedule Builder is subject to change (especially during new semesters) and could affect the functionality of MScheduler. If a feature is no longer working as expected, please email us @ mschedulerteam@gmail.com and we'll get right on it!

NOTE 2: MScheduler is an independent extension and is not affiliated with College Scheduler or the University of Michigan. It was created and maintained by current University of Michigan students.
